item.title: A Universal Time (AUT) Codes (October 2025)
item.content:encoded:
A Universal Time is an action-adventure game within Roblox, boasting core RPG elements and a world that’s been heavily inspired by Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure and other similar anime stories. A Universal Time requires players to explore a large world and gain powers along the way. Alongside their exploration of the map, they will be required to take on various opponents, including NPCs as well as real players. Although the biggest inspiration for A Universal Time is Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure, with the game including many of the anime’s ‘Stands’, it also showcases characters from other popular anime, including Dragon Ball, One Piece, and more. 

You will have to progress through the game to get stronger and unlock more powerful moves, and for newer players to the game, that can be a daunting task. With both PvP and PvE fights involved, getting ahead of the competition fast is of utmost importance, and using codes is a good way to make some quick progress. A Universal Time codes give players various rewards in the game, including Skin Chests, UCoins, UShards, and more, all of which will come in handy to the average player.

All New A Universal Time Codes (October 2025)

  • KARSWHAT (NEW)
  • SORRYFORDELYA (NEW)

Although the game currently has only two active codes, more are likely to be added in the future. A Universal Time codes often have fixed timeframes when they will be usable, meaning that when existing codes expire, new ones will be added.

With this in mind, we encourage players to bookmark this page, as any new codes or expirations will be updated here immediately. Although you can keep track of new codes by joining the game’s official Discord or through their socials, keeping tabs on our page is going to be the easiest way to do so.

How To Redeem A Universal Time Codes

A Universal Time is one of those games where, before you can redeem codes, there is a criterion that needs to be met. Before you can make use of the above codes, you will have to join the A Universal Time Roblox group. Once you have done that, follow the steps given below to redeem your A Universal Time rewards. 

  • Launch Roblox and open A Universal Time
  • Press the ‘M’ key on your keyboard to open up the shop
  • Select the Miscellaneous option to reach the codes tab
  • Enter one of the active codes given above into the text box
  • Click on ‘Redeem Code’ to receive your rewards

For more Roblox Guides and trending games, check out Weak Legacy 2 Codes, which is a hugely popular game now on Roblox.
